header.title: List of Popeye the Sailor cartoons (King Features Syndicate)

categories.category: Lists of animated television series episodes

article.bdy:
This is a list of the 220 cartoons starring Popeye the Sailor and produced for television syndication through
King Features Syndicate from 1960 to 1962, and the 185 cartoons produced by Hanna-Barbera Productions in association with
King Features Syndicate from 1978 to 1983 and 1987 to 1988. Cartoon shorts are grouped by production studio:
Larry Harmon Pictures , Rembrandt Films/ Halas and Batchelor, Gerald Ray Studios, Jack Kinney Productions,
Paramount Cartoon Studios
, and Hanna-Barbera Productions.
